categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Weet was a Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport employed by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

Weet was a transport containing Rebel spies hiding inside a Rebel Class-D cargo container Pi, surrounded by Type A Mines. The minefield was cleared by a single Assault Gunboat and was inspected to see what was hiding inside. The transport was then launched from the container and attempted to escape, only to be disabled by the Gunboat. System Patrol Craft Scythis then boarded the transport and captured it.
The event was recorded and used to train future pilots on how to use a Gunboat. One of those pilots was Maarek Stele.
